definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese literary theory is living, and its structure is organic.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代文論是生命性文論，是一種整體有機結構觀。

sentences.english: Whether it is animals or ancient figures will let you clap wow .
sentences.chinese: 無論是動物還是古代人物都會讓你拍手叫絕。

sentences.english: It turned out that a number of tribes in ancient China, there is looting marriage customs.
sentences.chinese: 原來，在古代中國的一些部落，有搶婚的習俗。

sentences.english: Shehuo is a continuation of an ancient tradition of offering sacrifices to Land Gods and Fire Gods.
sentences.chinese: 社火是古代祭祀土地神和火神活動的延續。

sentences.english: Qin Shihuang, ancient China's unifier, burned books and buried scholars alive.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇，古代中國的統一者，焚書坑儒。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith steeps himself in ancient history.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯沉湎於古代史中。

sentences.english: It is based upon the teachings of the ancient Chinese sage, Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 是中國古代的孔聖人的理論。

sentences.english: The neo-Archean rocks possibly exist in Tieklik metamorphic rocks.
sentences.chinese: 鐵克力克可能有新太古代變質岩系的存在。

sentences.english: At present, the age of storm deposits reported in China may be traced back to late proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 目前我國已報導的風暴沉積時代可追溯到晚元古代。

sentences.english: Collectibles have been a part of almost every culture since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 從古代開始，收藏品就是文化的一部分。

sentences.english: The president also harked back to ancient Sinhalese martial heroes.
sentences.chinese: 總統又提及古代僧伽羅戰爭英雄。

sentences.english: Women in ancient times because of the head shaped like a bun, formerly known as bun mountain.
sentences.chinese: 因形如古代婦女頭上髮髻，舊稱髻山。

sentences.english: In the architecture, the old building like Cosmological temple was built according to the idea of "Round Sky & Square Earth".
sentences.chinese: 在建制上，古代的建築樣式如明堂就擬天圓地方而建。

sentences.english: Southeast the Lovelorn Peacocks Fly is a famous long narrative poem in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 《孔雀東南飛》是一首膾炙人口的中國古代敘事長詩。

sentences.english: The literature of drug names is an important part of the ancient medical literature.
sentences.chinese: 藥名文學是古代涉醫文學的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Some ancient cities had two to three times as much water per person as many cities today.
sentences.chinese: 某些古代城市每人的用水量是今日許多城市的兩三倍。

definition: people from ancient times/the ancients/the late (i.e. person who has passed away)
pre-Qin, Chinese history up to the foundation of the Qin imperial dynasty in 221 BC
Qin dynasty (221-207 BC), founded by the first emperor Qin Shihuang 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2], the first dynasty to rule the whole of China
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods/Eastern Zhou (770-221 BC)
pinyin: Chun1 qiu1 Zhan4 guo2 Shi2 dai4

definition: the not-very-distant past/modern times, excluding recent decades/(in the context of Chinese history) the period from the Opium Wars until the May 4th Movement (mid-19th century to 1919)/capitalist times (pre-1949)
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
